reviewText: If you love Craig, even if you just like him, get this freaking DVD now! I've had it for a few days and I've already watched it three times. I went to his live show in Oklahoma at the Winstar Casino and he did this same show there, so techniquely I've heard this material 4 times, and I'm still laughing at everything until my side hurts and I start crying. And I'm probably annoying my dad because I'm laughing so loud. I love Craig Ferguson so much and if it wasn't for him, I might be here right now. I have depression, so whenever its really bad to where something really bad might happen, I either watch his nightly show, watch "A Wee Bit o' Revolution" or, now, this DVD, and I literally feel a million times better. This DVD is so hilarious and I highly recommend you get it. You know, I heard a man in London died because he laughed 25 minutes straight. I don't believe this because I laugh through this entire show, and I'm still here. And I'm pretty sure this show is longer than 25 minutes. GET THIS DVD NOW!!!!
Craig Ferguson is a brilliant comedian. And he says things that make you think. I really enjoyed this program.
i laughed through the entire show - so funny!!  loved it :D

Does This Need to be Said? Craig Ferguson.
Score: 100 Why I liked it. I favor stand up for about an hour before bed, it leaves me with a pleasantly smooth endorphin wash.  Unlike a negative euphoria, such as may be present with oh, hey...2 grams of coke, but let's ask Craig for his opinion. There you have it.... Ferguson not only delivers , he does so with a subtle tone, body language, twinkly eyes and a dash-all smile-I think, if you're reading this little review, good; however, he is ON all the way through. I laughed so hard, my face muscles actually began to ache...I adored his take on Kevin Costner more than I ever thought I would, in non-situational comedy.
Craig is a uproar in and of himself, and YES!

YES!!!  This stuff definitely needs to be said and you need to hear it!  Not since Joan Rivers death had I been so devastated by the loss of a true television PERSONality.  No, Craig Furgeson didn't die, he just left CBS's Late Late Show... and possibly tv entirely... Ohhh Nooo!  But have no fear, he's still cranking out stellar standup specials every year and this one is a standout from a few years ago.  Unfortunately, Craig was the last talk show host who had the cajones to do real TALK... Off script, totally unpredictable, and often shockingly candid, he was the last jewel in an industry now completely given over to dull soulless empty heads who desperately grovel in service to the celebrity promotional machine.  Do yourself a favor and watch all of his standup specials, he's fearless and I LOVE him!

I'm a fan, so that should inform anyone who reads this.  The film is a little dated, but not by much, and Ferguson's way of telling a tale, beginning at the start of his performance, then meandering (or running!) away from the original premise, them coming back to it at the end, is what intrigues me about him.  He does offer some belly laughs and there's a hint of homophobia in some of his gestures--however, having known some very manly Scots who would wear their ladies' lingerie if caught without their own clothes at hand, I think it's more cultural 'geste' than that,  Summary: good bit not great.
Very funny and creative - makes me want to see him live.

Ferguson was much funnier on his show with his sidekick Geoff. With the ability to be uncensored in what he says in this movie, he seems like a "fish out of water". He revels in the opportunity to swear, almost too much. It's almost as though he gets more enjoyment from this than entertaining the people, or entertaining the people through swearing. He just seemed to be more funny on the show knowing he couldn't swear.

I've been a fan of Craig Ferguson for years. Loved his late night TV Show.  This takes the TV Show in a slightly more edgy direction (I wish there were fewer F-Bombs dropped), but overall the comedy is smart, funny, and self-deprecating.
His wry wit and quirky way of looking at things is great!
I did not care for his routine. Near the middle of his show, he lost me.  I thought it was boring.

I do not watch television so I was completely unfamiliar with Craig Ferguson. I was worried for the first few minutes because I thought all he was gonna do was stand around for an hour and say the "F" word a million times. But he gets past that and I really liked the show. I love the Scottish accent and his continued to get thicker the longer he talked. For me it was fairly unique humor and not at all offensive, unless the cursing bothers people. It doesn't me, but he certainly cussed up a storm. I guess there was some sexual humor, but I also do not find that offensive unless it's the only thing the comedian has to offer. Craig moved around a lot with the subject matter but it was very easy to follow along. Maybe I'll have to look up some old episodes from his Late Late Night Show.

mildly funny

This is the perfect show. I was never a huge fan of his late night show; I thought a little Craig went a long way. Once this show gets rolling, it never stops. By the time he was proving the existence of God, I was laughing so hard, it hurt. And let me say, the way this show ends is the most unexpected and the most brilliant ovation-worthy inspiration I've ever seen for a stand-up comedy show! I cannot recommend this highly enough!

Love it very funny

Sorry, Craig, it just didn't connect for me.  Maybe I've just learned to love the angst and there wasn't enough of it here.

Very  VERY funny! This performance was really my first exposure to Craig Ferguson and it was love at first sight, I had to buy the DVD.  This is NSFW, but not what I would call raunchy in the humor, he covers everything from talking about sex in Scotland, having kids and family to life on a late night talk show.  And he told a joke.

very funny

On a scale of 1 to 10 I give Craig a 100,000,000,000! He might have a potty mouth but I don't care. He and Richard Pryor are my all time favorites. He always cracks me up.
d
Craig is so funny!!!

This Does (Not) Need To Be Said, but I like millions of others in America think Craig Ferguson is a true magically funny trip!  I fell in love with his humor the first time I saw him his late night show.  I had liked him as an actor (and incredibly cute I might say) in the Dru Carey show years ago, but I fell in love with his twisted humor from the beginning of his late night show.  Whether or not you've ever seen him, this and other discs of his live performances, as well as his books, are a must have!  I can't go to sleep until I see Craig Ferguson's late night 'are you for real' trip:)  Meet him on disc, on TV, online or in book, you'll love him!
Craig Ferguson is hilarious!! Saw him when he came to my city. Great entertainer.
Not as good as his late-night show...
While I am a big fan of Craig Ferguson, this show was pretty lame.  Just stringing together a bunch of profanity without the usual wit.  Disappointing overall
We watch his show, this tape IS NOT his show.  Just understand that.  And his accent comes through a lot stronger here than on TV.  It was funny and the company delivered it as promised, no issues.

Sorry Craig...you are capeable of much better work.  You have shown more insight in your book.  Repeated use of F bombs grew old in the first minute or two.  This is material one would expect from an amateur working "blue".
RECEIVED.
i am a huge fan of craig ferguson.  this stand up routine is very clever.  my family greatly enjoyed watching it again and again.
The Scottish thinking man's view on life and its ups and downs. You need to watch this with a group of family and friends, so you can discuss your own experiences.

Caveat: I'm a Ferguson fan-boy, so I'm probably biased.

I loved this performance the first time I saw it, and now that I've seen in at least 4 times, it's still great. If it matters to any potential buyers, yes, there is some swearing (not bleeped out as he is on The Late Late Show) and several sexual references/innuendos -- none of which bothered me, and I may be a wee bit more prudish than average.

This is a really funny stand up by Craig Ferguson. You get to see a side of him that you don't on his tv show. He's a really good storyteller (rather than just telling jokes) and comes across as a very likable guy. I enjoyed it very much.
I purchased this as a Christmas present for my mom.  She thought it was hilarious.  If you are a fan of his comedy and/or his TV show, you'll be happy with this purchase.

A wild man on the stage and a person I try to watch at night, but the local TV station thinks it more important that we need a half-hour dose/delay of Hollywood glitz and rumors before his show. Funny as they come, almost a stream of thought comedian.

his comedy comes from wit, intelligence and the tragedies he has experienced.... he shares his life with us and he is just funny as pick your own disclaimer... i love eddie ... fangirl all the way... he is smart... he is funny ... and he has good taste in clothes for his body type... eddie is always a good time insert your own expletive deletive here...
Watch his CBS show every night. This was uncensored and raunchy but very funny, couldn't stop laughing. I'll defiantly watch it again in future.
For fans of Craig this is an addition to any collection. I love him because he is so funny and charming. Like Pepo. or is that the pope?
Craig is very funny and this video was fun to watch. It is very quick witted and very funny. Love him! Hope to see him,live some day.
Americas most successful import!  NEVER send him back.  Craig is a terrific talk show host and a great stand up comedian!
If you love his late late show, you will love this video.  Craig is a very funny funny person. funny
Yes, yes it does need to be said.  Hilarious!  He jokes about everything.  And who doesn't love his accent?  Better than his previous shows...and those were pretty good, too.

I buy Craig Ferguson because I watch his TV show and I think he's neat.  Despite the fact that he got a Grammy nomination for this, I think it didn't quite match previous shows.  That said, I loved it!
Hasn't left the DVD player. He almost has every joke memorized. Enough said? Ferguson fan must have. Worth the money to crack up laughing.
I love everything he does and just when you think he can't get even funnier, he does it!  There is language but nothing more than your kids hear on rap records!  LOL
He's a funny comedian and he has alot to say on different topics. I enjoyed listening to him, he really cracked me up.

I have watched this special several times before deciding to purchase it. Craig Ferguson is incredibly funny. He takes on the world as he simply attempts to tell a joke. Be warned, there are no CBS lawyers to sensor him. He is a bit "cussy" as he puts it. If you enjoy one minute of the Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, then you will love this special.
I watch Craig Ferguson every night at 12:37. I love the horse and Joeff  the gay robot. especaiy when he dances when he was he Craig.

While Craig is clearly a different show from Gaffigan or Dunham, he has his own brilliant style that stands out.  If you enjoy the Late Late Show (and if you don't I would see go see the Doctor...hehe) than you will love this.  I would not recommend this as family friendly, unless you are particularly liberal with your childrens' viewing material, but for anyone 13+ with a sense of humor this should be great.
I got to know Craig Ferguson when I found his television show. I now read everyone of his books, and I have every DVD. He is an intelligent comedian. FANTASTIC

I think not. Craig Ferguson is simply funny, as long as you don't mind the occasional four-letter-word.
Either on TV or on the stage, he is witty and "real". Comedy apparently comes easy to him.

This was the first performance of stand-up by Craig Ferguson that I have seen apart from television.  Hilarious!!!  He drops the F-bomb a lot but it's not really gratuitous.  I laughed my ass off!  Seriously, I had to pick it up and glue it back on.  Craig Ferguson has a unique grasp of humor that I've not experienced in decades.  The way he totally deconstructs the whole talk show genre is brilliant.

Great show,  if you like Craig you'll love this show...

It's a full show of Craig doing standup routine,  clean enough for teenagers but it not completely safe for work...
Having the freedom to swear seems to have stunted his humor.  Perhaps on his show, it's having a quick witted guest to play with that makes his humor really soar.  Solo on stage, not so much.
No OOO LALA's here not even a little flag over the mouth so be ready for full on raw Scotish American Humor Craig is AWESOME!!!
Very funny. If you only get one, Buy this one! Better than his tv show because he is not sensored.
i came across mr ferguson by accident a couple of years ago. i have to watch the late late show every night and his stand up is even better. i love him
Craig Ferguson is just a funny man.  Not always language friendly for the little folks, but it's okay to have adult thinking humor at times.
I love everything by Craig Ferguson. He is so naturally funny and I could listen to his voice all day long.
What can you say when it comes to Craig Ferguson?  Intelligent; a crack humourist and so very original; does it really need to be said?
This is a great DVD from Craig Ferguson.  Saw it on TV a while back and wanted to purchase the DVD to watch it a few more times.

Craig Ferguson dishing it out in front of a live audience while he is on tour.  It's so much fun as he cuts on and makes fun of almost everything worth taking about and maybe not !  Lets hear it for good old Craig!!

I have seen Craig perform twice and read his books...I was surprised at the tone and language of this performance. I still like him ...just bought copies of his book to give away.... He did warn that he likes profanity and would be profane...so...perhaps it's all on me.
It's not like his TV show its just stand up. But it's pure Craig just the way you like him .... Naughty naughty naughty!  If you like Craig you'll like this video. He's very funny as usual!!!!!
My best friend really likes Craig Ferguson. I purchased this for her and she was ecstatic -- she says it is wonderful. It's a must-have for any Craig fan.

He's all grown up and wants to be able to swear when he feels like it.  Too bad he has to pay a quarter each time to do so.  The lessons he's learned he's more'n willing to share.  And you should all follow his advice.

Brilliant comedy. Simple as that. What can I say more about it? Craig is hilarious and this is just another standup DVD showing how that is true. I still think there should be behind the scenes things on these DVDs... The standup itself and Craig himself are 1000000+ stars. The DVD's features not so much. Still defiantly worth getting! If you're a Craig fan you should already have this. If you like to laugh but aren't a fan... get this, laugh, then become a fan!
I Love Craig Ferguson!! He is one of my all time favorite's. If you are a female who loves this sexy, hilarious Scotsman, you will love this. It delivers Fergasm's galore!!

Mostly this is hilarious, but in 2 or 3 places Craig is REALLY contemptuous of women. One place is just after the toads/sex education segment. It is absolutely cruel and offensive.

Take it to your analyst, Craig.

What can I say about Craig Ferguson, other than he is one of the funniest comedians around. I have enjoyed all of Craig's standup shows on CD and continue to watch them many times over. The man just makes me laugh! Love his style of comedy!

Craig Ferguson is one of a handful of original-styled comedians. He makes me laugh, he's just too much! The handful of comedians I love and respect are, Craig Ferguson, Ron White, Bill Engval, Dennis Miller... I'm sure there may be a few I have missed but these guys are GREAT and the important thing is they make me laugh and that's a GOOOD THING in this day and age!

I'm going to preface the review by saying that I'm a huge Craig's fan and think he is the most brilliant comedian/late-night host alive so the review is highly biased. Nonetheless, I've watched other specials featuring Craig and I sincerely think this one is the best of all. Now, you may have caught this particular show on Comedy Central (CC) few months ago and think that I'm crazy rating it at five stars and I wouldn't blame you ;) I watched it first on Netflix and decided to DVR CC's piece and couldn't be more disappointed. What censorship did to this show is nothing short of a crime! Please don't judge this based on what you saw on CC - it really is A DIFFERENT show when enjoyed in the raw form, as Craig intended. After the DVR'ing fiasco I decided I NEED to get this DVD. If you like Ferguson's style of comedy you will simply love it! From the first second to the last bit. Imo, priceless! It would be better if there was a Blu-ray version but come on, this is comedy not sci-fi. GET IT AND ENJOY!

We love Craig Ferguson, so there is almost nothing he could do that we would find fault with.  Even if he did nothing, we'd laugh as soon as we saw his face.  So I guess this review is not that helpful, but he is just intrinsically funny.  He likes to curse but apparently we don't mind cursing when done by a person with a slight accent.
The dvd was very funny. I did see this show three years ago in Boston. He is a very talented man and you will enjoy this dvd.
My husband and I watch Craig all the time, on DVR of course, and love him!!!  We will watch this video again and again and show it to friends.....

This one is his BEST yet. I'm a LONG time fan & a Craig Watcher. If you like his Late Late Show on CBS you will LOVE his videos even more. Craigy LOVES to 'cuss' & he has a flair for it. I'd listen to him read a phone book & die laughing.
Absolutely a must buy!  Even better than his 1st DVD; he gets funnier everytime I watch him either on TV or his standup shows.  I just think he's great!

Ferguson brings his realism and honesty to the stage. His wit is outrageous with a clarity that does not select a specific group, but rather holds a mirror up to our society showing us what is both good and bad about ourselves in a way that helps us laugh. Great video worth seeing again and again.
I love Craig Ferguson, and I often find myself deleting emails after asking myself the three questions introduced by the title. I find there is little that needs to be said by ME. :-D
It was good but I didn't have any LOL moments. I wouldn't watch it again - his humor just wasn't for me
Always fun to sit back and just enjoy Craig Ferguson on DVD.  He never disappoints.

This is so funny.  I love Craig Ferguson.  I never missed his Late Night show when it was on.  If you are a fan then you really need to watch this stand up show.  If you are Scottish then you need to watch this stand up show.  If you are American, oh, it doesn't matter, you really should watch this show.  Craig Ferguson, in my opinion, is one of the funniest people on stage & T.V..  He makes fun of everyone, including himself.  Yes, he swears a lot, but it works with him.  I have seen him in live in person and we all never stopped laughing!  This will help you lighten up about life.  So worth your time.  ENJOY!!
Does this need to be said? Does this need to be said, by me? Does this need to be said, by me, right now?
Smart, funny and silly as f&%k..

Other than the "show" at the beginning and ending, Craig Ferguson is hilarious. I don't like stupid comedy (which is just stupid, and people are supposed to laugh at it), so I don't get the two guys dancing around the stage before and after. The actual comedy show, however, is awesome.
I love the humor of this man.
Seriously funny!  Watched it the moment I got it in the mail.  Craig Ferguson at his best!

This is such a funny set - the best of his shows that I've seen on Prime and EPIX. He's clearly having such a great time on stage, and his mood is infectious. He tells great stories drawn from his life as a Scotsman, and he's in much more in his element here than he ever was on late night tv. Start to finish, this is a funny, entertaining show, and stands up well to rewatching.
